channel.title: The Norman Bates Memorial Soundtrack Show Podcast
channel.description: This is my attempt at turning the 2 week KFJC archive of the NBMSS into a podcast. This is in no way associated with KFJC.
channel.itunes:author: Robert Emmett and KFJC.org
channel.itunes:subtitle: From Robert Emmett and KFJC.org. Soundtracks, show tunes, television themes - all the music you've gradually grown to trust over the course of several generations. So sit back, relax, and enjoy the Best Music You Ever Saw.
channel.itunes:summary: From Robert Emmett and KFJC.org. Soundtracks, show tunes, television themes - all the music you've gradually grown to trust over the course of several generations. So sit back, relax, and enjoy the Best Music You Ever Saw. (Graphic courtesy Judy Zillen)
